entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear in the morning and early in the afternoon then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30. POP 30%
